SYSTEM: GATE(v3-ele_and).pdf: Página 20
Limitations of Gazetteer Lists
• Gazetteer lists are designed for annotating simple, 
regular features 
• Some flexibility is provided by matching
• Word roots
• Whole/part words
JAPE RULES
